description:
Purpose & Responsibilities of Position:

The Facilities Building Maintenance Supervisor (2nd shift) will provide effective leadership and/or management to all assigned resources. Additional duties include assisting the FBM Leadership Team in supporting all daily operations tasks including, but not limited to, resource management (internal/external), understanding and upholding policies and procedures, inventory control, process improvement and updating procedures, guides, and manuals as necessary. The position will also include responsibilities related to data entry, data analysis, and creating spreadsheets, tables, and graphs as necessary to develop methods to track and measure key performance indicators (KPIs) and other metrics as assigned by FBM Management Team.

The estimated pay scale for the Supervisor Building Maintenance (2nd shift role based in Los Angeles, CA, is $90,000 - $110,000/ per year. Additionally, the position is eligible to participate in up to 8% of the company bonus pool. We offer a wide variety of benefits including, but not limited to: Medical, Dental, Vision, PTO, up to 5% 401(K) match and tuition reimbursement. Final compensation packages will ultimately depend on education, experience, skillset, knowledge, where the role is performed, internal equity and market data. We are committed to offering our employees opportunities for professional growth and career progression. Grifols is a global healthcare organization with employees in 30 countries focused on patient health and providing impactful results.
